alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 5:47AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN ROCK...LOUP...NORTHERN CUSTER AND BLAINE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM CDT... At 547 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dunning to 8 miles west of Anselmo to 9 miles east of Arnold. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Taylor, Brewster, Sargent, Merna, Anselmo, Dunning, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Weissert, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Fox Bayou, Round Valley, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Walworth, Milldale, Linscott, Pleasant Hill, and Almeria. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 100 and 133. Highway 2 between mile markers 233 and 280. Highway 92 between mile markers 258 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
